section.name: Tech Reference
section.p: This document provides an overview of the various documents (and artifacts) links that has been created in order to collect all information about Semantic Web Domain and previous SAPERE projects.

tr.td: This is a link to a section which reviews main semantic web technologies. The aim of this section is summarize all information needed to understand what comes next: choices, design, comparisons and so on.
This is a link to a complete overview of relevant aspects of the actual saperenode implementation (by Matteo Desanti and Michele Morgagni).
